description: W.A. Sumanawathie Vs. R.A.G. Dingiri Banda - Hon. A.H.M.D. Nawaz, J - Undelivered notices not notified-Appeal dismissed-Relisting- A Court whose act has caused injury to a suitor has an inherent power to make restitution before Appeal relisted.
